{"id":933696285,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1681486495,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/933696285/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Longest Balanced Substring of a Binary String","memory":"42.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int findTheLongestBalancedSubstring(String s) {\n        int cnt0 = 0, cnt1 = 0;\n        int maxLen = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length();) {\n            while (i < s.length() && s.charAt(i) == '0') {\n                cnt0++; i++;\n            }\n            while (i < s.length() && s.charAt(i) == '1') {\n                cnt1++; i++;\n            }\n            maxLen = Math.max(maxLen, 2 * Math.min(cnt0, cnt1));\n            cnt0 = cnt1 = 0;    \n        }\n        \n        return maxLen;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-longest-balanced-substring-of-a-binary-string","has_notes":false}
